name: typescript-in-the-browser
description: attempt to see if and how much we can run typescript compiler in the browser

scripts.bundle-src: cd dist ; browserify src/test.js -x typescript -t brfs -o ../static/src.js ; cd ..
scripts.all-typescript: npm run bundle-typescript; npm run minify-typescript
scripts.build-production: rm -rf static dist ; tsc ; npm run cp-static ; npm run bundle-typescript ; npm run bundle-src; npm run minify-typescript
scripts.dev-prepare: rm -rf static dist ; tsc ; npm run cp-static ; npm run bundle-typescript ; npm run bundle-src
scripts.dev: cp-static; concurrently --kill-others "npm run watchify" "npm run tsc-watch" "npm run browser-sync"

author: Sebastian Gurin
